text: RT @Thingowonk063: @TwinStrangersP Biblically accurate angel vibes. I love it.
@Thingowonk063 @KananiDino She did amazing work!

@KananiDino As stated in the og tweet, you can catch episodes of Syntax a day early -- including our initial double release! -- by supporting us on Ko-Fi! Find us here, and support us if you like what you've heard so far!
https://t.co/hvppZzhfQZ
Poster done by the amazing and multi-talented @KananiDino, who also voices our domineering Miss Vaux! <3

It's officially ONE WEEK until our special double release of Syntax! Don't tell VINCULA, but we were able to get our hands on this page from the scientists 👀 Tune in on March 31st to your podcast platform of choice and listen to the (horrific) journey begin! https://t.co/ZPu9HaUvJg

We’ll be having a discussion post for each episode for everyone to share theories and fun bits they may have noticed! We love seeing everyone theorize, and everyone’s reactions to our first two characters, Silas and Miss Vaux!

We passed 300 listens total yesterday! Thank you so much to everyone who has supported us thus far! We’re so excited to release more content, but we’re hoping y’all are enjoying the prologue! If you’d like to discuss with fans, subscribe to our reddit r/syntaxpod!

Thanks to @MorbidForest for mentioning us on their Audio Drama Sunday list, and be sure to give the others featured on the list a follow! We are so appreciative of all of the wonderful members of the audio drama community!

Thank you so much to @CallOfTheVoidP for their amazing review of our podcast thus far! We love seeing your insights and comments! And we definitely can’t wait for you to watch the horrors unfold 😈 https://t.co/UpbET5xYkg

Itching for more content before our dual episode launch on the 31st? Look no further! If you decide to support our cast and crew on Ko-Fi, you’ll have access to an exclusive piece of bonus content, already posted for listening! 👀 Support us here! https://t.co/VGBGjHgGci
Happy St. Patrick’s Day to all of our listeners, as well! It’s something strange to release something on a holiday!
We also have a TikTok under syntaxpod but Twitter REALLY doesn’t want me to share that with the link, apparently — but find us on TikTok, too!

We also have released our official website, https://t.co/n5WO7iJ6mH and our subreddit at https://t.co/JdmGLJASkZ! Follow us for updates, discussions, and more info, and find the transcripts for live episodes on our website!

With the official release of our Prologue, we’re also releasing our social media. If you like what you hear so far, we’d appreciate any support on Ko-Fi you’d be able to give us! There will be exclusive content, and maybe even a treat later today 😉

https://t.co/VGBGjHgGci

OUR PROLOGUE IS LIVE! Listen to it on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Amazon Music, and Google Podcasts! Here’s a direct link to the Spotify version. We hope you enjoy this beginning of the end! 

https://t.co/HTI7vYfvsS

A reminder that while you’re waiting for our Prologue and socials to go live, you can check out our trailer on all major podcast streaming services! Check our pinned tweet for a direct link to our Spotify.
The Prologue for Syntax releases in less than 24 hours! Our official release time is 9 am EST on every other Thursday! We can’t wait for you to hear the next peek into our series!

Can we just say, WOW! Over 100 listens in the first 24 hours! We’re so grateful, and have received so much support already! Stay tuned for our social media release (including Ko-Fi and Website!) alongside our Prologue release!
We’re working hard on getting everything ready for our prologue release on the 17th, and then our special two part episode release on the 31st! Thank you so much for the support we’ve had so far!

SURPRISE! We’ve released a trailer for our first Season of Syntax! Take a listen on Spotify at the link below, but you can also find us at Apple Podcast and soon the rest! We hope it gets you HYPE!
https://t.co/dAyXqYXYwI
Alongside a team of explorers and scientists, Silas plunges into the Breach, the world beyond, and is touched by terrors beyond his wildest dreams.

What is Syntax about, you may ask? Well, here’s our podcast description! A biweekly horror fiction podcast that follows Silas Caldwell, a linguist, who finds himself employed by VINCULA, a biotech company with an unearthly set of artifacts in their possession. 1/2
Follow us for updates, and don’t forget to share with friends and family! We really believe in this project, and hope you’ll all love it, too!
WE HAVE A RELEASE DATE! Thank you to everyone who has supported us so far, we can’t wait for you to hear what we’ve been working so hard on with our amazing cast and crew! https://t.co/ZXRR83vFlg
